description:
To mend fences, the Oinky Doink café will swing for the fences in a friendly game of baseball! But not everyone is as determined as Nagomi to play fair and square...
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Blood-Soaked Ballgame: The Kyun of Victory Shines On You
Senketsu ni Somaru Hakkyuu: Eikou wa Kimi ni Kagaya Kyun
Une balle teintée de sang frais ! Un incroyable succès !
鮮血に染まる白球 栄光は君に輝キュン♡
